description: Detects the removal of a port or application rule in the Windows Firewall configuration using netsh
name: Netsh Firewall Rule Deletion
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line.text:*firewall* AND process.command_line.text:*delete*) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:*\\Dropbox.exe AND process.command_line.text:*name\=Dropbox*)))
author: frack113
